name: The Jigsaw Puzzle Room
description: If you are a fan of jigsaw puzzles, then this game is for you. There are a number of images that you can choose from and there is also the option of loading in your own. There are 3 different puzzle sizes and you can do the puzzle on the floor, or on a table.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer Storage: 210 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive required
